mapper.sql: SELECT t.client_id, t.book_payment_estimation_sid, t.book_payment_estimation_code, t.book_type, t4.name AS book_type_name, t.book_source_category, t5.name AS book_source_category_name, t.vendor_sid, t.vendor_code, t.company_sid, t.company_code, t.is_tuihuo, t.document_date, t.payment_year, t.payment_month, t.company_brand_sid, t.business_channel, t.currency, t.currency_unit, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t1.vendor_name, t2.brand_name, t2.brand_code, t3.company_name, t.book_feature FROM s_fin_book_payment_estimation t LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t1 ON t1.vendor_sid = t.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company_brand t2 ON t2.company_brand_sid = t.company_brand_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t3 ON t3.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_book_type t4 ON t4.code = t.book_type LEFT JOIN s_con_book_source_category t5 ON t5.code = t.book_source_category
mapper.insert:
insert into s_fin_book_payment_estimation
client_id, book_payment_estimation_sid, book_payment_estimation_code, book_feature, book_type, book_source_category, vendor_sid, vendor_code, company_sid, company_code, is_tuihuo, document_date, payment_year, payment_month, company_brand_sid, business_channel, currency, currency_unit, remark, handle_status, creator_account, create_date, confirmer_account, confirm_date, data_source_sys,
#{clientId}, #{bookPaymentEstimationSid}, #{bookPaymentEstimationCode}, #{bookFeature}, #{bookType}, #{bookSourceCategory}, #{vendorSid}, #{vendorCode}, #{companySid}, #{companyCode}, #{isTuihuo}, #{documentDate}, #{paymentYear}, #{paymentMonth}, #{companyBrandSid}, #{businessChannel}, #{currency}, #{currencyUnit}, #{remark}, #{handleStatus}, #{creatorAccount}, #{createDate}, #{confirmerAccount}, #{confirmDate}, #{dataSourceSys},
mapper.select:
SELECT t.client_id, t.book_payment_estimation_sid, t4.book_payment_estimation_item_sid, t.book_payment_estimation_code, t.book_type, t.book_source_category, t12.name AS book_source_category_name, t.vendor_sid, t.vendor_code, t.company_sid, t.company_code, t.is_tuihuo, t.document_date, t.payment_year, t.payment_month, t.company_brand_sid, t.business_channel, t.currency, t.currency_unit, t.remark, t.handle_status, t.creator_account, t.create_date, t.updater_account, t.update_date, t.confirmer_account, t.confirm_date, t.data_source_sys, t1.vendor_name, ifnull(t1.short_name,t1.vendor_name) as vendor_short_name, t2.brand_name, t2.brand_code, t3.company_name, ifnull(t3.short_name,t3.company_name) as company_short_name, t5.material_code, t5.material_name, t4.unit_price, t6.name AS unit_price_name, t4.price_tax, t4.price, t4.currency_amount_tax, t4.currency_amount_tax_yhx, ifnull(t22.currency_amount_tax_log, 0) as currency_amount_tax_hxz, (t4.currency_amount_tax - t4.currency_amount_tax_yhx - ifnull(t22.currency_amount_tax_log, 0)) AS currency_amount_tax_dhx, t4.tax_rate, t11.tax_rate_name, t17.purchase_contract_code, ifnull(t15.manufacture_outsource_settle_code,t16.purchase_order_code) AS purchase_order_code, t18.delivery_note_code, t4.quantity, t4.quantity_yhx, t4.quantity_hxz, t4.currency_amount_tax_fk_yhx, t4.currency_amount_tax_fk_hxz, t4.currency_amount_tax_kp_yhx, t4.currency_amount_tax_kp_hxz, (t4.quantity - t4.quantity_yhx - t4.quantity_hxz) AS quantity_dhx, t4.clear_status, t4.clear_status_money, t4.clear_status_quantity, t4.account_valid_date, t4.is_business_verify, t4.business_verify_period, t4.is_finance_verify, t4.item_num, t13.nick_name AS storehouse_operator_name, t7.account_date, t7.inventory_document_code AS inventory_document_code, t7a.inventory_document_item_sid, if(t7.refer_doc_category = 'PO' or t7.refer_doc_category = 'RPO', t7b.quantity, t7d.quantity) as order_quantity, if(t7.refer_doc_category = 'PO' or t7.refer_doc_category = 'RPO', t7b.contract_date, t7d.contract_date) as contract_date, t16.product_season_sid, t10.product_season_name, t14.name AS book_type_name, t4.purchase_order_sid, t16.raw_material_mode, t16.purchase_mode, t4.material_sid, t4.sku1_sid, t.book_feature, t20.sku_name as sku1_name, t21.sku_name as sku2_name, t24.name as material_type_name FROM s_fin_book_payment_estimation_item t4 LEFT JOIN s_fin_book_payment_estimation t on t4.book_payment_estimation_sid = t.book_payment_estimation_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_vendor t1 ON t1.vendor_sid = t.vendor_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company_brand t2 ON t2.company_brand_sid = t.company_brand_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_company t3 ON t3.company_sid = t.company_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_material t5 ON t4.material_sid = t5.material_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_measure_unit t6 ON t6.code = t4.unit_price LEFT JOIN s_inv_inventory_document t7 ON t4.refer_doc_sid = t7.inventory_document_sid LEFT JOIN s_inv_inventory_document_item t7a ON t4.refer_doc_item_sid = t7a.inventory_document_item_sid LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_order_item t7b ON t7a.refer_document_item_sid = t7b.purchase_order_item_sid LEFT JOIN s_del_delivery_note_item t7c ON t7a.refer_document_item_sid = t7c.delivery_note_item_sid LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_order_item t7d ON t7c.purchase_order_item_sid = t7d.purchase_order_item_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t8 ON t.creator_account = t8.user_name LEFT JOIN s_con_tax_rate t11 ON t11.tax_rate_name = t4.tax_rate LEFT JOIN s_con_book_source_category t12 ON t12.code = t.book_source_category LEFT JOIN sys_user t13 ON t7.storehouse_operator = t13.user_name LEFT JOIN s_con_book_type t14 ON t.book_type = t14.code LEFT JOIN s_man_manufacture_outsource_settle t15 ON t4.purchase_order_sid = t15.manufacture_outsource_settle_sid LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_order t16 ON t4.purchase_order_sid = t16.purchase_order_sid LEFT JOIN s_pur_purchase_contract t17 ON t16.purchase_contract_sid = t17.purchase_contract_sid LEFT JOIN s_del_delivery_note t18 ON t4.delivery_note_sid = t18.delivery_note_sid LEFT JOIN sys_user t19 ON t16.buyer = t19.user_name LEFT JOIN s_bas_product_season t10 ON t10.product_season_sid = t16.product_season_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_sku t20 ON t4.sku1_sid = t20.sku_sid LEFT JOIN s_bas_sku t21 ON t4.sku2_sid = t21.sku_sid LEFT JOIN ( SELECT log.book_payment_estimation_item_sid, SUM(log.currency_amount_tax) as currency_amount_tax_log FROM s_fin_clear_log_payment_estimation log WHERE log.shengxiao_status = 'WSX' GROUP BY log.book_payment_estimation_item_sid ) t22 ON t22.book_payment_estimation_item_sid = t4.book_payment_estimation_item_sid LEFT JOIN s_con_material_type t24 ON t5.material_type = t24.code
and t.client_id = #{clientId} and t.book_payment_estimation_code = #{bookPaymentEstimationCode} and t.book_feature = #{bookFeature} and t.book_type = #{bookType} and t.book_type in (#{bookType})
and t.book_source_category = #{bookSourceCategory} and t.book_source_category in (#{bookSourceCategory})
and t16.purchase_org = #{purchaseOrg} and t19.nick_name like concat('%', #{buyer}, '%') and t16.purchase_order_code like concat('%', #{purchaseOrderCode}, '%') and t16.purchase_mode = #{purchaseMode} and t18.delivery_note_code like concat('%', #{deliveryNoteCode}, '%') and t17.purchase_contract_code like concat('%', #{purchaseContractCode}, '%') and t.handle_status != #{handleStatusNot} and t.handle_status = #{handleStatus} and t.handle_status in (#{handleStatus})
and t5.material_code like concat('%', #{materialCode}, '%') and t5.material_type in (#{item})
and t20.sku_name like concat('%', #{sku1Name}, '%') and t21.sku_name like concat('%', #{sku2Name}, '%') and t4.is_business_verify = #{isBusinessVerify} and t4.is_finance_verify = #{isFinanceVerify} and t4.business_verify_period = #{businessVerifyPeriod} and t4.clear_status != #{clearStatusNot} and t4.currency_amount_tax_fk_yhx != #{currencyAmountTaxFkYhx} and t4.currency_amount_tax_fk_hxz != #{currencyAmountTaxFkHxz} and t4.currency_amount_tax_kp_yhx != #{currencyAmountTaxKpYhx} and t4.currency_amount_tax_kp_hxz != #{currencyAmountTaxKpHxz} and t4.clear_status =#{clearStatus} and t4.clear_status_money = #{clearStatusMoney} and t4.clear_status_quantity = #{clearStatusQuantity} and t4.clear_status_money in (#{clearStatusMoney})
and t.company_sid = #{companySid} and t.company_sid in (#{companySid})
and t.vendor_sid = #{vendorSid} and t.vendor_sid in (#{vendorSid})
and t16.product_season_sid = #{productSeasonSid} and t16.product_season_sid in (#{productSeasonSid})
and t.document_date = #{documentDate} and t.payment_year =#{paymentYear} and t.payment_month =#{paymentMonth} and t.company_brand_sid =#{companyBrandSid} and t.business_channel = #{businessChannel} and t.currency = #{currency} and t.currency_unit = #{currencyUnit} and t8.nick_name like concat('%', #{creatorAccount} , '%') and date_format(t7.account_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{accountDateBegin},'%y%m%d') and date_format(t7.account_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{accountDateEnd},'%y%m%d') and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d') and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d') and t.updater_account like concat('%', #{updaterAccount} , '%') and t.update_date = #{updateDate} and t.confirmer_account like concat('%', #{confirmerAccount} , '%') and t.confirm_date = #{confirmDate} and t.data_source_sys = #{dataSourceSys} ${params.dataScope}
order by t.book_payment_estimation_code desc, t4.book_payment_estimation_item_sid asc
